meanings.sent1: The intumescences on his arm were caused by a bee sting.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the intumescences on the patient's ankle.
meanings.sent3: The intumescences on the balloon made it look like a giant grape.
meanings.sent4: The intumescences of emotions in her heart were overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The intumescences on the tree bark were like small bumps.

meanings.sent1: She noticed a painful intumescences on her finger after hitting it.
meanings.sent2: The intumescences on the fruit indicated it was overripe.
meanings.sent3: The intumescences on the cake frosting made it look like a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The intumescences of clouds in the sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The intumescences on the tire showed it needed more air.

meanings.definition: The act of swelling or enlarging
meanings.sent1: The intumescences of the river after heavy rain caused flooding.
meanings.sent2: He observed the intumescences of the balloon as it expanded.
meanings.sent3: The intumescences of the dough as it rose in the oven surprised the baker.
meanings.sent4: The intumescences of the city's population led to increased traffic.
meanings.sent5: The intumescences of the flower buds signaled the arrival of spring.
